content: the dress is worked from the top down raglan style the top has a button back it is joined at the waist and the skirt is worked in the round directions are given for 2 different skirts this was designed for the heart to heart bears sold for the heart to heart charity in shanghai china which raises funds for surgeries for chinese children with congenital heart disease these directions are free for your personal individual use please do not distribute or reformat them for commercial use or sell them please do not sell items made from these directions unless profits go to charity
